message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product that I think you'll love. I'm looking for a serious buyer who can appreciate its value, and I believe you might be the right person. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I'm willing to pay a premium for it, but I need to stay within my budget. Can you consider my offer?

I understand that you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I have to consider the value of the product and the time I've invested in it. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to the value I have in mind. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1350000. This is the lowest I can go, and I'm hoping you can see the value in it.

I understand your perspective, Alice, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1250000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider my revised offer?

I appreciate your honesty, Bob. I can see that you're really interested in the product, and I'm willing to make one more concession. However, I still need to get closer to my target price. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping you can see the value in it.

I understand that you're trying to get closer to your target price, Alice, but I'm still not comfortable going above $1200000. I'm willing to make a final offer of $1200000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. If you're willing to sell it to me at this price, I'll make the purchase
